translation.key: Hello, I was sent to you by a carpenter to help you.
translation.value: 你好，我是木匠派来帮助你的

translation.key: **He asks with a smile**: Hello, have you just arrived?
translation.value: **他笑着问**: 你好，你刚刚到吗?

translation.key: Yes, I came to you to become an adventurer, I need money.
translation.value: 是的，我是来帮助你成为探险家的，我需要钱。

translation.key: Well, I'll tell you [Player], things have been very bad here lately, the residents are living in fear. Recently, a little girl was killed, as we understand there is a dead force involved.
translation.value: 好吧, 让我告诉你 [Player], 这里最近很不太平, 居民每天生活在恐惧之中. 就在最近,有一名小女孩也被杀害, 在我们看来，这是一种死亡暴力.

translation.key: **With horror in his eyes**: What ... Dead People
translation.value: **他的眼神带着恐惧**: 什么...... 尸..体...

translation.key: **He said hurriedly**: I don't know for sure. Over time, the residents will tell you everything, or you will feel for yourself what is happening there.
I didn't expect it to be this bad. Well, what can I help you with?
translation.value: 我没想到会这么糟..那么....我能帮你什么忙吗?

translation.key: Come with me, our guys dropped boards, help me collect them.
translation.value: 跟我来, 我们的伙计掉落了一些板子，请帮我把他们捡回来.

translation.key: Okay generally help me collect all the boards! I will reward you for your help.
translation.value: 好吧，帮我收集所有的板子！ 我会奖励你。

translation.key: **Weakness in asks**: Oh, hell, they're heavy, I've got them all.
translation.value: **虚弱地说**: 哦, 见鬼, 它们很重, 我全拿到了.

translation.key: Great job! Your muscles won't hurt you anyway [Player] *laughter*
*laughter*
translation.value: *大笑*

translation.key: Now hand them out to my boys and let them go on with their business.
translation.value: 现在把它们交给我的伙计们，让他们继续他们的工作。

translation.key: Good [Talked]!
translation.value: 很好 [Talked]!

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Is tired. But I did it!
translation.value: 虽然很累，但终究还是完成了

translation.key: Well done, take this. I think you need it if you're going to be an adventurer. Go straight, and you will go straight to the residents, if you ask where to go.
translation.value: 干得好啊，收下这个。 如果你想成为冒险家，我认为你需要它。 如果你想问接下来去哪，那么直走，你会找到村庄.

translation.key: **With a smile**: Well thank you, good luck with your work!
translation.value: **面带微笑**: 好的我真是谢谢你，祝你工作顺利铁子

translation.key: [Stranger]Hi, my name is [Player], how do I find the nearest village?
translation.value: [陌生人]嗨, 我的名字是 [Player], 请问我怎么找到最近的村庄?

translation.key: **She concerned**: Hello, my name is [Talked].
translation.value: **She concerned**: 你好，我的名字是[Talked].

translation.key: I'll be happy to help you settle in, but could you give my brother a note? He works now on the ship that you arrived on, i could have done it myself, but they won't let me in.
translation.value: 我会很高兴帮你搬到这儿来, 但你能不能帮我把这份笔记捎给我的哥哥? 他现在在你去过的那艘大船上工作.本来我可以自己去做，但是他们不让我进去.

translation.key: Yes, of course i help, will you be here [Talked]?
translation.value: 那当然，我会帮你的，你会在这等我吗？

translation.key: I'll be here waiting!
translation.value: 嗯，我会在这等!

translation.key: Hello, are you Diana's brother?
translation.value: 你好，你就是戴安娜的哥哥吧?

translation.key: **He said rudely**: Yes. Did something happen to her?..
translation.value: **他粗鲁地说**: 是我，她怎么了..

translation.key: No, don't worry, she just asked me to pass you the notebook.
translation.value: 别担心，她很好.她让我来给你递个本子

translation.key: Well, thank you very much, and tell her I'll be seeing her this evening.
translation.value: 好的，谢谢你嘞，顺便帮我转告她我我今晚会过去找她。

translation.key: Yes, good luck with your work!
translation.value: 是的，祝你工作和Flower一样顺利！

translation.key: **She says impatiently**: Oh, you're already here, you're fast!
translation.value: **她不耐烦地说**: 哦, 你早就到了, 真快!

translation.key: Really?
translation.value: 真的吗?

translation.key: Yes. How is he?
translation.value: 是的. 他怎么样?

translation.key: He told me that he is busy now, and will visit you later in the evening!
translation.value: 他告诉我他现在很忙，晚上会来看你的！

translation.key: I'm so happy! They won't let me in because of the problems that are happening. Dead men kidnap girls, and then they find them dead.
translation.value: 太好了，他们不让我过去因为最近发生的事.死神绑架了她们，她们后来都被发现已经死了

translation.key: **He sounds surprised**: Only girls? Why the dead?
translation.value: **他的声音听上去很惊喜**: 只有女孩？为什么是死人？

translation.key: **She's upset**: Honestly, I don't know. The dead or who it is, our headman says that most likely the dead ;(
translation.value: **她很难过**：老实说，我不知道死者是谁，我们的头目这么说 ;(

translation.key: I came to you to become an adventurer, as I know you have magical creatures.
translation.value: 我来找你是为了成为一名冒险家，因为我知道你有魔法制成的产物.

translation.key: **She sounds like she knows it**: An adventurer? We have a Guild of adventurers, but to become an adventurer you need to pass the tests.
Yes the test [Player]. First, you will need to collect the minimum equipment. To apply and pay the fee. And only after that you will be assigned the position of adventurer.
translation.value: 是的没错，一个测试[Player]. 首先, 你需要至少收集一些最垃圾的装备. 申请并支付费用. 然后你才会有资格成为冒险家.

translation.key: Is everything so strict? Yes, I think I can handle it.
translation.value: 这会很难吗？不过我想对我来说应该小菜一碟

translation.key: All right come on I'll show you our village [Player].
translation.value: 好的，跟我来吧。我带你在我们村庄溜一圈[Player].

translation.key: Yes come on ;)
translation.value: 我已经迫不及待了;)

translation.key: **She made it sound like there was something wrong with them**: Oh, my God, where are the slime from?.
translation.value: **她很不可思议地说**: WTF,这你妈的史莱姆是哪来的？

translation.key: I don't know [Talked], here even have slimes. Wahoo
translation.value: 我也不知道啊 [Talked], 这里甚至有史莱姆。 芜湖!

translation.key: Well, Yes [Player], but now they are becoming more frequent
translation.value: 确实 [Player], 但现在他们出现地越来越频繁

translation.key: **You speak proudly**: All right [Talked], I'll clear the way!
translation.value: **你自豪地说**: 没办法了[Talked], 只能露一手了!

translation.key: **You said in disgust**: Phew, the slime is so disgusting...
translation.value: **你厌恶地说**: 呕，这史莱姆好恶心...

translation.key: **She says with a smile**: Well you could use a bath [Player] ;)
translation.value: **她面带微笑**: 你可以洗个澡了 [Player] ;)

translation.key: I will not refuse such an honor ;)
translation.value: 不胜感激 ;)

translation.key: Ah here is and decided, we'll get there I'll show you where I live. And I'll introduce you to the places. And you wash :)
translation.value: 啊，好吧，我们去我住的地方吧。 我会向你介绍那些地方。 然后你可以去洗澡了:)

translation.key: All right, shall we continue on our way?
translation.value: 行吧，那现在我们可以继续出发了吗

translation.key: Yes let's go
translation.value: 当然，走吧.

translation.key: **He said with surprise**: Did you defeat the slugs on the instructions of our master? Take this the master asked me to give you.
translation.value: **他惊讶地说**: 你按照我们主人的吩咐打败了史莱姆? 拿着这个，我们主人让我给你的

translation.key: Yes, I could. They were very slippery.
translation.value: 是的我做到了，它们真的又黏又滑.

translation.key: Hehe.. What did you think?
translation.value: 哈哈..你会怎么想？

translation.key: Well, not so difficult, at the same time I warmed up.
translation.value: 还好，不算太难，只算给我热热身

translation.key: Okay I need to serve, good luck to you, don't give up ;)
translation.value: 好的，我需要上报，祝你好运， 不要放弃！ ;)

translation.key: **She said very rudely**: Who the hell are you? What do you want?
translation.value: **她粗鲁地说**: 见鬼，你是谁，想干嘛

translation.key: Do you know that your father is looking for you?
translation.value: 你知道你的爸爸一直在找你吗?

translation.key: I hate this old guy, he doesn't have time for me......
translation.value: 我讨厌这老家伙，他根本不肯陪我

translation.key: He can only go there. Do it. And we can't spend time together...
translation.value: 他可以只去哪里！ 做他的事！ 却不能花点时间陪陪我...呜呜....

translation.key: Enrages...
translation.value: 生气...

translation.key: Calm down let's go back together and tell him everything? Maybe he just cares about you like that.
translation.value: 冷静下来，我们一起回去和他好好说？ 可能他就是以这种方式关心你。.

translation.key: All right, let's go back.
translation.value: 行吧，我们走.

translation.key: Are you ready?
translation.value: 你准备好了吗?

translation.key: Yes..
So where was she?.
translation.value: 所以，她在哪?.

translation.key: You just don't get angry, everything's fine!
translation.value: 你只要不生气，事情会好起来的

translation.key: In fact, she didn't want to come back, she was offended that you weren't spending time together. You can't rest.
Damn why didn't she ask for it herself? Okay, don't worry thanks for the work :) Everything will be fine, we will decide something with daughter
translation.value: 该死的，她为什么不自己说呢？ 好的，别担心，谢谢你的帮助:) 一切都会好起来的，我们会和女儿一起决定的

translation.key: Well, nice :) Good luck to you
translation.value: 那么, 很好 :) 祝你好运

translation.key: To extract any ore [Player], you will need a pickaxe.
